body.name: Saudism White Nightstand with Charging Station, End Table with Glass Drawers, Night Stand with LED Lights, Wood Bedside Tables for Bedroom, 15.7”×13.7”×23.8”
features: ⬜【Nightstand with Charging Station】2 standard plug outlets + 2 USB ports, supplying power for the light strip, table lamp and speaker; you can also charge cell phone, tablets, smart watch, etc; Just say goodbye to 'Low Battery Anxiety' when playing with your phone in bed or sofa

⬜【Adjustable Hidden LED Light】Saudism night stand comes with a LED light strip, which is including 3 types of colors(Cold, Warm, Nature) and 6 levels brightness adjustment. [ The light strip can illuminate both the upper compartment and the middle glass drawer ]
⬜【Flexible Storage Space】Saudism bedside table is designed with a open compartment and 2 drawers, includes both display items and hidden storage features
⬜【Sturdy & Durable】Saudism end table is made of upgraded MDF, the base legs are solid wood, overall appearance premium, matte texture, surface is waterproof and easy to clean
⬜【Wide Usage】Saudism side table is also suitable putting beside the sofa in living room or beside the desk in office, got both putting decorations and organizing messy stuff
💌【Easy Assembly】You can complete the simple assembly in 30 minutes; Any issue can be solved with our 7/24 Customer Service, your 100% satisfaction is our goal !

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Metal Handle Of Drawer Carefully polished metal handles provide the ultimate touch Drawer with Reeded Glass It is a tempered glass, very strong. The light coming through the glass looks great Solid Wood Legs The legs base is made of solid wood and provide stable support for the nightstand Waterproof Finish The panel is high-quality triamine board, more solid than ordinary particle board, matte finish, extreme touch, and looks very advanced

Video of Saudism Reeded Glass Nightstand A nightsand with charging station with charging station and led lights Our wood nightstand comes with a built-in charging station with USB port, making it easy to keep your devices charged while you sleep.With its LED light, this bedside table is also perfect for late-night reading or creating a cozy ambiance in your room.

Introducing Saudism modern and stylish nightstand The nightstand features two drawers for storing your essentials. It can be also used as an end table.With its contemporary design, Saudism nightstand will add a touch of elegance to your bedroom. BUY IT NOW

How long does delivery take? Delivery typically takes 3-7 working days, depending on your location. We have warehouses in the East and West and will send your parcel by FedEx. What do I do if I don't receive my parcel in time ? Please don't worry, our after-sales team is here to help you further. What should I do if I receive broken / defective item ? Each order will be checked and packed carefully before shipping. If the item is broken/damaged, don't worry please, just take several photos to show the broken/damage and the package, we will arrange the replacement FREELY as soon as posible. Is it easy to assemble? You can complete the simple assembly in 30 minutes with our easy-to-follow instructions or Assembly Video in the page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant night stand
reviews.reviewText: To start of the shipping was fast.We are not very handy so it took us like 2 hours to put one together and the second one took us about 45 min. The instructions are clear but we are just not that handy.It is a very nice elegant design, easy to put together if you have experience.It has 3 different light colors, works with a remote.The drawers are opening and closing smooth, I like the glass front panel.It is not too big, but good enough for small tings in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is beautiful, great quality!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Assembling was a bit hard, too many pieces, however totally worth it, it is beautiful, great quality too. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but difficult to put together
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this turned out. It’s exactly like the pictures. It came with protective wood on the inside so nothing was damaged. When I moved I bought all new furniture online which means putting it all together I normally have no issues with directions or using the tools provided or swapping things out for my screw drivers but I struggled with this one. The screw driver provided broke after trying to screw in 3 screws. Like the entire handle broke off. I used one I had but it was difficult to screw somethings in and I was wishing I had a drill to make it easier and faster. The directions show to put the screw in specific holes when attaching the brackets to the drawer but it was wrong. If I listened to the directions I wouldn’t have been able to put the front pieces of the drawers on. Such a pain to put together without a drill but worth it in the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great end tables!
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these for my bedroom and absolutely love them. Plus, the lighting features almost act as a lamp. Super brightening. Definitely recommend these! The only downfall is since they are shiny black it is hard to keep dust off of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Build, Quality product
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at first due to the reviews of difficulty and bad quality, but both are wrong.Packaging was great. The exterior box corners were dinged, but everything inside was placed so nicely. If the box was messed up and everything was jumbled, this was due to your delivery person not caring.Everything is well numbered and pretty self explanatory. If you've ever made ikea furniture, this was way easier and way better quality. Even if the instructions were bad - which they were very easy to understand - building this was a breeze.Legos are harder than this.P.S. - The provided wrench is fine, but use your own screw driver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: Top of product arrived scratched, light is very dim, and when plugged in, the table omits an electrical humming noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's cute I don't know I bought it for my daughter.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my daughter for a house warming. She loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly just fallow the installation step by step before starting
reviews.reviewText: Love it. I call it all in one!
